io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.player

Class PlayerBackpack

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.thebusybiscuit.slimefun4.api.player.PlayerBackpack

  • public class PlayerBackpack
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the instance of a SlimefunBackpack that is ready to be opened. It holds an actual Inventory and represents the backpack on the level of an individualItemStack as opposed to the class SlimefunBackpack.
    Author:
    TheBusyBiscuit
    See Also:
    SlimefunBackpack, BackpackListener

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerBackpack(PlayerProfile profile, int id)
      This constructor loads an existing Backpack
      PlayerBackpack(PlayerProfile profile, int id, int size)
      This constructor creates a new Backpack

      This method marks the backpack dirty, it will then be queued for an autosave using save()

      This will open the Inventory of this backpack to every Player that was passed onto this method.

      This method will save the contents of this backpack to a File.
